items.title: Roll For It: Dungeons and Dragons in YA
items.description: It's been a banner year for Dungeons and Dragons in YA literature. Roll on in for some delightfully nerdy reading.

items.title: Can Historical Romance Books be Queernormative?
items.description: Two new queer historical romances are set in an 1800s England without homophobia. What happens when historical fiction is queernormative?

items.title: A History of Sci-Fi Book Cover Trends
items.description: From pulp sci-fi covers to Art Deco to paintings and now digital art, here is a tour through sci-fi covers through the centuries.

items.title: 4 Books For Budding Young Writers To Boost Their Creativity
items.description: Whether it's through poetry, short stories, or graphic novels, these books will help the young writer in your life find their voice!
